text:
I just noticed that fsl comes installed with a hell lot of interesting atlases: HarvardOxford, Juelich, JHU, MNI, etc.

Should we have the possibility to fetching this (at least locally when present) ? For example, I find the Juelich atlas really interesting.

![inversecovariance](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/634068/16281427/b09127d4-38c4-11e6-9545-0dade0a10e0c.png)
title: Add more atlases ?
clean_text: I notic fsl come instal hell lot interest atlas harvardoxford juelich jhu mni etc should possibl fetch least local present for exampl I find juelich atla realli interest inversecovari
